(b)On November 2, 2020, Amit Sharma communicated his intention to resign from his role as American Tower Corporations (the Company) Executive Vice President and President of the Asia region, effective February 28, 2021 and, thereafter, serve as Special Advisor to the Companys Asia region, and retire on July 1, 2021.
